entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3 except minus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3 except minus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
